791110.name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Monster Pack 1
791110.description:
Bring life to your world by using Monster Pack 1 to put some bite, slash and stab where your players least expect it! This pack can be used to help set the mood when making descriptive images of the world you are building (also great for use with the commercial license DLC for use in your modules promotional images).

We have had many requests to create this series of DLC for the customers who are using a TV-in-Table setup or projectors to DM right in the software itself. Mix Monster Pack 1 with the core dungeons to make millions of new scenes! You can even mix Monster pack 1 with all other DLC for unlimited scene making power!

  • 1 New panel FULL of Monsters
  • Over 30 Different Monster Types
  • Can be resized and deformed as needed
  • Animated Monsters
  • Animation options to be added in the future for free!
